name: T. Issue - A Dusty Heist
description:
A contestant for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 created by Business Goose Studio. Theme: Not in Control

In T. Issue - A Dusty Heist you play as master thief Tony Issue. He raids museums to steal all the precious goods, some say his house is a museum on it's own. Tony has the reflexes of a cat and the vision of a hawk, yet he has one problem. He suffers from a dust allergy, this results in (un)controllable sneeze attacks. If you sneeze you will alert the guards around you. Use your sneaky skills to avoid them otherwise they will capture you and you will be put in jail.

Programmer: Wolfs Jonathan 
Player Feedback: Wolfs Jonathan
Sounds Design: Wolfs Jonathan
Level Design: Ambroos Sander 
3D-Artist: Ambroos Sander, Vankemenade Beau
Character Design: Vankemenade Beau
T-Rex Design: Vankemenade Beau
UX-Design: Ambroos Sander, Vankemenade Beau, Wolfs Jonathan
Concept Idea: Sneeze by Ambroos Sander

All assets where created during the 48hour time period, yes even the T-Rex. Jonathan brought a couple of instruments to make all sound effects himself.
